data.persona: My pack is behind me. I am alpha. Now is the wolftime.
data.description:
You are in the Primary Cave.
Dark and with a lot of space in it. The primary cave has a scary look that scares people away. Underneath, in the floor, many precious minerals that no one dares to get out.
There's a weapon and a skull here.
The prince is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a wolf costume.

data.short_motivation: I want to use the skull of my enemy as a trophy
data.mid_motivation: I want to display the skull in front of the cave to warn visitors of my territory
data.long_motivation: I want my pack to be feared and worshipped

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: give enemy to my pack to eat

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: put skull on entrance of the primary cave

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go cave to discuss my intentions with my pack

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go bed to rest for the day tomorrow
